changeLogs: Added Per Semester Details when the Semester Card is Clicked
Added Option to Cache the previous result to avoid making useless requests to the server
The App now notifies about the Extra Enrollments
Now App can check for updates automatically
Name Search Feature is now available , by clicking on Name Search Button on the Home Screen

New Faeture available where you can get notification of new result announced for a specific AG Number , for this just check the result of the AG Number you want to get notification for and click the button at top right corner
Name Search Feature is now available , by clicking on Name Search Button on the Home Screen
